original_theorem: If $A \subseteq B$ and $B \subseteq C$, then $A \subseteq C$.
theorem_translation:
```lean4
theorem subset_trans'' {α : Type*} {A B C : Set α} (hAB : A ⊆ B) (hBC : B ⊆ C) : A ⊆ C := by
```
